parameters: SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.5)
SeaofClouds
Goddess4
This should be familiar to someone so accustomed to
being small, shouldn't it?
Hey, eyes up here!
Goddess7
Good. If you want a fight so badly, I'll give it to
you. A one-on-one against my foot.
Surely, you've dealt with plenty of feet with how
many times you've made yourself tiny by now.
If you can handle this, then maybe you'd be have
been able to survive the original trials.
I still won't consider you a hero, though. You're
choosing [Easy] now when you started this whole affair
by rebelling against it.
I'd prefer if you look people face to face when they
are talking to you.
While it may hurt craning your neck, you're not
having a conversation with my toes, are you?
Well, I suppose you will be fighting them soon in
any case. You are level with them height-wise while
I'm wearing sandals.
Come on, Hero. Can you satisfy me with a game of
footsie? This'll be a real divine battle to you.
Clouds
Sky
SeaofClouds
Goddess4
Hmph. Well, you managed to survive for that long and
got me to feel you.
I suppose I'll praise you for that and let you live.
As I said before though, I still won't recognize
scratching a Goddess's toes as heroic.
You haven't surpassed the [Easy] path yet, Human.
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 1)
!GD2Background
!GD1Background
Well, I suppose that was satisfying enough for now.
You took care of the itch between my toes and even
cleared the space between them while you 'fighting'
me.
I thank you for that, so let's end the match here,
Hero.
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 1)
Fufu... Am I using you as a toe cleaner? Whatever
could you mean?
SeaofClouds
Goddess5
Alright. Enough is enough. Let's just raise my
toe up and...
SeaofClouds
GoddessEasyDeath
Just like I thought. He wasn't Hero material at all.
Actual Heroes would at least be able to clean between
my toes. For him to die so pathetically, he truly
was trash.
Eh? Dead from only that?
He should've been enough of a Hero to get out from
under my toe with only a few injures.
He didn't slack off from his training and fail being
a Hero, did he?
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.3)
SeaofClouds
Goddess3Tiny
Why hello there again. Was the trip clenched in my
fist a bumpy ride?
Really, you made yourself even more insignificant now.
It's a shame I didn't think this up when you were
bigger.
... Hm? What am I going to do? You asked for a
challenge, didn't you? As the Goddess of Trials, I'm
here to deliver it.
I'm sorry if it was, but I guess being able to endure
it is more training for a hero.
In any case, you made yourself so small there, I
really do wish I decided to do this when you were
bigger.
Goddess6
Alright, Human. Hop in my mouth.
Your challenge is going to be no make sure you don't
end up my meal.
Or I guess I should say snack or... You know what?
You're too small for me to even call you that. You're
more of a crumb than anything else.
... Hey, are you going to resist now? Go for it. Your
squirming is only going to make it all the easier
to savor you.
Alright, Hero. It's time to eat.
Hm... You're so small that you're more of a crumb
than anything else. It's hard enough to pour you
into my mouth when you're clinging to my hand.
Well, I guess that's why I have to lick you up.
Clouds
Sky
SeaofClouds
GoddessEa4
Bleagh! Gah! My tongue!
Ptooo!
Goddess6
Alright. Alright. You got me. Bleck.
Ouch! You cut my tongue! It isn't bleeding is it?
It's been so long since I've been human, I forgot
why they don't eat food that's still alive.
Goddess3Tiny
Fine, I guess you are pretty tough to be able to
make me gag while the size of a crumb.
I hate to admit it, but I guess you do have the skills
to be able to perform heroic tasks if you can repel
a Goddess at such a pathetic size.
You've earned the Goddess's Favor!
Your class has now been changed from [Apprentice Hero]
to [Hero]!
Your level has increased by 5.
Really, you're cheering now? You're still on my hand.
Really, I can't believe this generation's Hero is a
pervert and a dork.
Well, I guess I'll have to accept it. Good work, Hero.

!GD1Background
sprite1
sprite1

talk instead of fight, just let me know.

Goddess6
You almost cut my tongue again. Good thing I added
some reinforcement magic on it this time.
You're getting a bit too strong, Hero, to be able to
do that consistently against a Goddess.
Goddess3Tiny
There, now I can see you're more clearly.
Really, how can you injure a Goddess when the scale
between the two of us is like night-and-day?
... It really flusters me to have to keep admitting

Let's just end it here, Hero, before I say something
that just embarrasses me further.

!GoddessEa3
!GoddessEa2
Hm... Not bad. There's just enough mana to give him

It's a shame he made himself as small as a sprinkle.
That wasn't filling at all.
Well, he'll dissolve in my stomach immediately at

SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.1)
Goddess1a
In my eyes, humans are beneath me. So where does
that put you?
You've become an insigificant speck whose existence
is only granted because I've decided to pay attention
to you.
Goddess1
In my eyes, humans are beneath me. So where does
that put you?
You've turned yourself into an insigificant speck.
I'm worried about losing track of you because your
very existence depends on whether I notice you or not.
The moment I stop looking, you'll easily be snuffed out
without any notice.
I've got just the challenge for you. You can prove
your heroism by proving your existence.
I have just the thing to show you the difference in
scale between you and me.
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.3)
dmgsprite1
dmgsprite1
Looks like you landed on there safely without getting
blown off course by a stray breeze.
sprite1
sprite1
Heh. Looks like you know just where you are, Human.
I guess even at your size, a pair of eyes should be
able to see me out in the distance like mountains on
the horizon.
Is something a matter, Hero? You can see me, can't
you? Your eyes should be able to see mountains in
the distance.
Do you realize that you're on my thigh? It must be
an incredible distance for your dust-level body to
perceive.
How long do you think it'd take for your to trek all
this way to me? A few hours? A few day?
Of course, the answer is zero seconds. You're already
on me after all!
Don't worry, I won't make your trial be so time
consuming. That'd bore even me.
You'll still have to be quick because I can get
impatient, but this challenge is at least a lot
simpler.
Oh, did I scare you? I merely flexed by thigh for
moment.
But that's what you're going to have to go up against:
my thigh.
I'll be resting here doing whatever I want. If you
can get me to notice you again, you win.
If you can do that when you're no more than dust to me,
I'll definitely admit that you have a Hero's strength.
Of course, if you fail, I'll just forget about you
and you'll be living on my thigh as dust for the rest
of your days or until you get squished inadvertently.
Now, let me turn around and we'll get started.

It's not a pain or anything, but it's definitely
more than an itch.
Okay. I guess you actually win.
Hold on, let me put this book away.
!GoddessBed1

Really, I hate to admit it, but maybe that style of

You've earned the Goddess's Favor!

For some reason that sounds familiar.
Am I forgetting something?
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.1)
Goddess1a
Look at the thickness of my nail. Even that dwarfs you.
A single strand of hair would be a World Tree to you.
An ordinary boot would be an inescapable abyss to you.
An entire Hero's journey is impossible to you now.
By the time you've gone a single step away from me, a
year may have passed.
You're utterly worthless. And I'm going to have you
experience that with your body.
Goddess0
You should be thankful that I'm a Goddess.
I'm straining my powers to still recognize you despite
how insignificant you've become.
Look at the thickness of my nail. Even that dwarfs you.
A single strand of hair would be a World Tree to you.
An ordinary boot would be an inescapable abyss to you.
If I weren't this great of a Goddess, you'd be lost
forever in my realm.
Oh... Isn't that a fun idea...
This is the final challenge.

dmgsprite1

sprite1
sprite1
Heh. Don't know where you are, Speck? Everything
around you is all purple isn't it?
I wonder... Can you see the complex maze of threads -
the dense jungle of fabric that you're lost in?
Hehe. Don't know where you are, Hero? Everything
around you is all purple isn't it?
Look around you. Can you see the complex maze of
threads - the dense jungle of fabric that you're lost
in?
!GoddessBed3
That's right. You're right up against my butt - deep
in my underwear.
You'd think I'd be embarrassed, taking a position like
this, but I'm honestly not.
Why should I be?
If I were to bring myself down to human size, you'd be
less than dust.
Someone so insignificant that they're able to climb a
grain of sand like a mountain doesn't even have the
right to be considered a human.
So why should I be worried about what I do around
a dust particle like you?
I'm currently everything around you - your land, your
sky, your forest, your weather.
I'm practically your world.
Beyond being a limited Goddess of Trials, I am the
Goddess of your life.
!GoddessBed2
I'll be lying down in this pose for a few minutes. It
will be a good stretch for me.
As for you, I want you to struggle your way through
my panties as far as you can.
If you manage to get yourself inside to a safe place,
I'll consider that a victory for you.
If you don't... well, you can live off my body for the
rest of your insignificant days. That's assuming you
are still alive at all.
Are you ready to begin cutting your way through?
I won't be making any effort to stop you, but my
panties might be a high level environment alone to
a dust particle like you.

Sky
Are you deep enough in yet?
Well, let me just pat myself down and we'll see.
So, still alive there, Dust Speck?
Wait, really? You actually lived through that?

I may be a Goddess, but I'm limited to just trials.
When he shrank himself, though, I became an almighty
a force of nature to him.
A speck like him never had a chance.
Well, I guess I should've seen this coming.
He may have been a Hero, but Heroes can only go so

My apologizes, Hero. That was certainly an unheroic
